LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescription: Tainted apparel can be auto-forbidden, or auto-magically destroyed upon haul!
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescriptionTwo: This setting is for those who would rather not deal with tons of useless tainted clothes after every battle!
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SmeltableApparelToDrop: Maximum Smeltable Tainted Apparel to Drop
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_NonsmeltableApparelToDro: Maximum Non-Smeltable Tainted Apparel to Drop
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_StripAfterHaul: Strip After Haul (Instead of Before Haul)
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescriptionThree: Note: At settings lower than "All", tainted apparel over the specified amount will be auto-magically destroyed upon haul!
